ca.team3161.lib.utils

Class Assert

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.team3161.lib.utils.Assert

  • public class Assert
extends java.lang.Object
    Assertions. Contains static methods which take a boolean condition and throw an exception if these conditions do not hold. Useful for debugging and during development.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Assert.AssertionException
      Really just a RuntimeException in disguise (more immediately obvious name to appear in stack traces)
